name: TheMaze
description:
Great first-person lowpoly maze game. You have to find the right way through the maze with small "puzzle". Can you find the right way?

-great orchestral soundtrack

-lowpoly models

-hard and big mazes

-three maps

current version 2.1

THIS GAME WILL NEVER BE PROPABBLY FINNISHED.





Soundtrack from map1 :)

Follow me on instagram for new info

And don't forgot check my YouTube! :)

I will be glad for all support from you :) I want to make this game beautiful in all perspectives :) this will be maybe first first-person maze game and when i finish development i want go to steam with it :)
